import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Sparkles, Shield, Globe2, BarChart3, ArrowRight, X } from 'lucide-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const features = [ { icon: , title: "AI-Powered Banking", description: "Experience banking enhanced by cutting-edge AI, offering personalized insights and intelligent automation." }, { icon: , title: "Quantum-Safe Security", description: "Future-proof protection with quantum-resistant encryption, safeguarding your assets for tomorrow." }, { icon: , title: "Borderless Finance", description: "Seamlessly operate across 190+ countries with instant currency conversion and local payment methods." }, { icon: , title: "Predictive Analytics", description: "Harness the power of predictive modeling to optimize your financial decisions and growth strategy." } ]; return (
